general_info:
A Personal Answering Service offers a comprehensive suite of services customizable to your business needs, including: 
 
 
Live Secretary Messaging, featuring:  
 
 
* Custom Messaging Services 
* Customized Protocols as Complex As Needed 
* Fields Used To Determine If Call Should Be Dispatched Immediately 
* Instant Conference Calling 
* Personalized Answer Phrase Multiple Lines Forwarded To Same Number 
 
 
You can also use the secretary during normal business hours as overflow receptionist to prevent "busy-signal" hang-ups and lost business. 
 
 
Voice Mail With or Without Operator Assistance: 
 
 
* Your Own Personal Greeting with Password Access 
* Group or Individual Mailboxes Available With Greetings and Announcement Services As Well 
 
 
Multiple Message Delivery Options:  
 
 
Messages will be faxed to number you request and messages can be e-mailed to your pc or cell phone.
